verses.plain: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.

tokens.t: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.

verses.plain: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
I will praise thee, O LORD, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.

tokens.t: , among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.

verses.plain: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.

tokens.t: great above the heavens: and thy truth

verses.plain: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;

tokens.t: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;

verses.plain: That thy beloved may be delivered: save with thy right hand, and answer me.

tokens.t: That thy beloved may be delivered: save
thy right hand, and answer me.

verses.plain: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.

tokens.t: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.

verses.plain: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;

tokens.t: the strength of mine head; Judah

verses.plain: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.

tokens.t: my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.

verses.plain: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?

tokens.t: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?

verses.plain: Wilt not thou, O God, who hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?

tokens.t: hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?

verses.plain: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.

tokens.t: Give us help from trouble: for vain

verses.plain: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.

tokens.t: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he
